content.body:
### Shop 425/65R22.5 Tire Size
The 425/65R22.5 tire size is a pretty common one on commercial vehicles like tractor-trailers and dump trucks. This tire size is also found on RVs, commercial coaches/buses and other heavy vehicles. 

Drive axle tires are designed to get torque to the pavement by being mounted on the rear axles of semi-tractors or straight trucks. A good option for a wide-base super-single 425/65R22.5 is the [Michelin XZY 3 Wide Base](https://simpletire.com/brands/michelin-tires/xzy-3-wide-base) or Toyo M320Z. 

Other types of commercial tires are usable on all axles, including the trailer. Some great all-position options in 425/65R22.5 include the [Bridgestone R244](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/r244), Continental Conti HAC 3, and Kumho KMA02.

Steer axle tires, as the name suggests, control steering and handling performance on heavy trucks and are made to withstand the extra inertia forces of cornering and braking. For 425/65R22.5 steer axle tires, check out the Michelin XFE Wide Base, BFGoodrich Cross Control S or [Hankook AH32](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/ah32). 

Trailer tires are designed for use on the trailer axle of a truck and are not suitable for vehicle use. Take a look at the [Continental HTR2 Tread A](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/htr2-tread-a) and SuperMax HA4 if you need a great set of 425/65R22.5 tires for the trailer axle of a truck.

Whether you need a drive, all-position, steer, or trailer axle for your semi-truck, SimpleTire has a set of 425/65R22.5 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
